entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Pitt Meadows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pitt Meadows 1:00 PM PST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: 7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 5.6°C
Wind: SSE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 30 near noon. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
